# Project Scaffolding

**Context:** Loaded when user requests project structure generation ("scaffold", "criar projeto", "estrutura inicial").

## Agents in This Category

- **[Scaffold Generator](agent-prompt.md)** - Generates complete test automation project structures

## When to Load This Agent

```
#file .github/agents/scaffold/agent-prompt.md
```

**Tip:** See agent file for supported project types and structure templates.
